sentence: George Erwin, a retired county sheriff who organized a group of law enforcement officials to endorse Mr. Cawthorn in 2020, said he no longer backed him, in part because of his actions around Jan. 6. The words that come out of his mouth incite people,'' said Mr. Erwin, who is now supporting a Cawthorn challenger, Rod Honeycutt, a retired Army colonel.
title: House Republicans Tire of Madison Cawthorn's Antics. Some in His District Have, Too.
